system.description:
You animate a single skull as your familiar from a corpse or skull you touch. The skull is bathed in blue flames and gifted with levitation-based flight.

It projects light in a near radius, it can speak and understand, it can retrieve small items, perform a minor bite attack, and it can deliver messages.

On your turn you can move it a near distance from you. Consider it an AC 10 creature with a 1d2 damage bite attack and 3 HP. Only one instance of this spell may be active at a time.

@UUID[Compendium.unnatural-selection.chant-and-spell-effects.Item.CQ1NsobeTGexh4QR]{Spell Effect: Fireskull Familiar}
